message:
" सियाही में घुली कागज़ पर नक्काशी मेरे एहसास हैं,
लोग अक्सर इसे कविता कहकर पुकारते हैं। "

आईये मिलकर ऐसी ही कुछ बेहतरीन नक्काशियों से रूबरू होते हैं। 
प्रौद्योगिकी साहित्यिक समूह (Technology Literary Society) और नगर राजभाषा कार्यवाहन समिति, खड़गपुर प्रस्तुत करते हैं काव्यांजलि का तीसरा संस्करण, कविताओं, ग़ज़लों और गीतों से सजी एक शाम।

आप सभी लोगों का इंतज़ार रहेगा, आईयेगा ज़रूर !

Venue: Netaji Auditorium (नेताजी प्रेक्षागृह)
Date: 10th April 2018,
Time: शाम 6 बजे (6 pm onwards)
Date: 06:00PM
Time: 10-04-2018
Veunu: Netaji Auditorium, IIT KGP
story: Technology Literary Society - TLS, IIT Kharagpur added an event.

I found solace in a place I least expected to visit ever in my life. The silence was a welcome change, the sun-kissed windows carefully crafted to suit the aura of the room, and the air filled with the scent of books that weren’t opened in ages. Numerous candles illuminated the front of the room, slowly failing against the rising sun.
I remember how I’d whine every time my mother forced me to come here with her. I was too young to understand her agony,  and the thought of suffering a fate as cursed as hers terrifies me now. She didn’t want me to have any strings attached to this place. Ironically, she became the very noose around my neck, pegging me right in the middle of this mess. I had been crying for hours, with bloodshot eyes and an aching heart.
“Victor?”
I’ve lost my senses, it seems. I’m hearing things now.
“What are you doing here?”
Again. This time it felt real. I lifted my head up. Reverend Anderson stood just a few feet away, shaken to the core as if he’d seen a ghost.
“You’re supposed to be locked up for… torturing that poor soul. And her, of all people?”
I freed her! Because no one else could see through the facade she had curated.
I stood up, no longer welcome at the place anymore. To atone for the most atrocious of sins was never going to be as easy as crying over her grave.
“Yes, because I’m a monster.”

-Akshit Lonare

Poetry is the voice of a beautifully painted scene, the language of imagination and passion. It is the manifestation of emotions.

On the occasion of World Poetry Day, Technology Literary Society presents the artwork of our member, Kushal Patankar.

Heard proses of Premchand, Jonathan Swift, or Tagore with regular or no rhyme scheme? Must have!! and also tried your hand at writing some too! If you get a kick from that, then get ready to witness the whole essence of poetry and prose in a tiny beautiful packet of Ghazal as TECHNOLOGY LITERARY SOCIETY, on the occasion of World Poetry Day, invites you to the very first Ghazal Workshop of our campus.
 We'll discuss the etiquettes and aesthetics of a ghazal, starting our journey from Amir Khusro to Meer to Ghalib, followed by a beautiful evening of Ghazal recitation by the ‘Shaayars’ of our own campus!
Date: 06:00PM
Time: 21-03-2018
Veunu: Kalidas Auditorium
story: Technology Literary Society - TLS, IIT Kharagpur added an event.

To celebrate women's day in its true spirit, we bring to you some of the choicest statements from the ladies out there in our team outlining its essence and beauty.
"The true celebration of women's day will be the day when we no longer need to celebrate it- Bindu Sancheti"
Design credits: Kushal Patankar

"जब मीर के आंसू मीरा की आँखों से बहे वो है कविता " प्रोद्योगिकी साहित्यिक समूह ले कर आया है एक ऐसी ही शाम जहाँ आप और हम होंगे कुछ ग़ज़ल और कविताओं के साथ। आमंत्रित हैं आप सब

समय   : शाम ६ बजे से      (6:00 pm)
स्थान    :  विक्रमशिला V4 (VIKRAMSHILA V4)

मशहूर कवि पियूष मिश्रा लिखते है,
"सुकून मिलता है दो लफ्ज़ कागज पर उतारकर, 
चीख भी लेता हूँ और आवाज़ भी नहीं होती |" 

कुछ इसी तरह की कविताओं और ग़ज़लों को लेकर प्रौद्योगिकी साहित्यिक समूह जल्द ही लेकर आ रहा है काव्य संध्या का चौथा संस्करण: 
यदि आप अपनी कोई भी कविता प्रस्तुत करना चाहे, तो इस form को भर कर औपचारिकता पूरी करे |

https://goo.gl/forms/SNHHPJ2CSIFEvNVh2

कुछ इसी तरह की कविताओं और ग़ज़लों को लेकर प्रौद्योगिकी साहित्यिक समूह जल्द ही लेकर आ रहा है काव्य संध्या का चौथा संस्करण: 
यदि आप अपनी कोई भी कविता प्रस्तुत करना चाहे, तो इस form को भर कर औपचारिकता पूरी करे |

Yet another gloomy day
Yet another gloomy day

"हवा से कह दो खुद को आज़मा के दिखाये,
बहुत चिराग बुझाती है एक जला के दिखाये।"

"हवा से कह दो खुद को आज़मा के दिखाये,

On the occasion of World Suicide Prevention Day 2017, TLS  presents to you all a beautiful hybrid composition by Yash Shukla

----
There will be days,
When you’ll feel, you possess nothing.
Deprived of love, trust, faith, hope
And all the feelings which constitute everything.
Those lonely times when
you’ll hate yourself the most,
mind will take absurd decisions
no matter how much it’ll cost.

ख्यालों के शहर में ख्वाबों की कब्र होगी,
खुशियों के रास्तों पर ग़म की गश्त होगी,
खामोश चीखों की पुरज़ोर गूंज होगी,
न जाने फिर कब लफ़्ज़ों में आवाज़ होगी।
मन शायद तुमसे बस यही सवाल पूछेगा,
क्या कभी इस रात की सुबह होगी।

But hold on, hold on for a moment.
Do you really want to die
Or again are these the external hopes
which are making your life a lie.
Because you think once you’re gone
they’ll talk fondly of you.
They’ll conclude whether it was
academic pressure or recession that killed you
or it was the black hole of competition
which finally consumed you.

पर,
उन कविताओं का क्या होगा जो तुमने लिखीं थी,
कैनवास की उस पेंटिंग का क्या होगा जो तुमने बुनी थी,
बचपन के सपनों की उस डोर का क्या होगा
जो तुम्हारी नींद से जुडी थीं,
साँसों की वो हवा भी बेकार हो जाएगी जो तुम्हारे हिस्से में लिखी थी।
वो कौन से ऐसी बात है जो जता देगी
कि तुम्हारी ज़िन्दगी जीने के लिए काबिल न थी।

Every time, this beast kills someone
in every 40th second,
imagine you’re not the only one, many are the
victims of this trend.
So when those days will make you weak,
just go to your friend and speak.

क्योंकि क्या पता ज़िन्दगी का यह मोड़
तुम्हे मौत से कुछ दिन बाद मिलवाये,
वो जो मकसद है जिसके लिए तुम आये हो
इस जहाँ में,
यह तुमको उसके और करीब ले जाए।

----
https://tlsiitkgp.org/suicide-is-never-an-option-f9dcb2ef3efc
